ch.phonon.drawables

Class DrawableText

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.phonon.drawables.AbstractDrawable
      • ch.phonon.drawables.DrawableText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Positionable

    public class DrawableText
extends AbstractDrawable
    The DrawableText class is used to place text items to the TEMView. The standard orientation of the text item is, that it is centered around the vector pointing to it.
    Author:
    phonon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      TextOrientation textOrientation
      The orientation can be chosen by the items of the TextOrientation Enum.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DrawableText(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, java.text.AttributedString text)
      The text item represented by the AttributedString parameter text is prepared by this constructor to be drawn at the position identified by the starpoint and localOrientation parameter.

    • Field Detail

      • textOrientation

        public TextOrientation textOrientation
        The orientation can be chosen by the items of the TextOrientation Enum. It is measured relative to the LocalOrientation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawableText

        public DrawableText(StarPoint starpoint,
            LocalOrientation localOrientation,
            java.text.AttributedString text)
        The text item represented by the AttributedString parameter text is prepared by this constructor to be drawn at the position identified by the starpoint and localOrientation parameter. By default the text orientation about this location is centered. This can be changed by adjusting the textOrientation member.
        Parameters:
        starpoint - StarPoint location to the text item
        localOrientation - LocalOrientation of the text item
        text -

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int x,
               int y)
        Description copied from interface: Drawable
        Checks if the Drawable contains the coordinate (x,y) in the temView space
        Returns:
        is true, when it (x,y) is contained in Drawable of the active state (most of the time the state that is drawn into the view)
